name: df-mvmul
params: setvar s0, setvar s1, setvar s2, setvar s3, setvar s4, setvar s5, setvar s6, setvar s7
body: |- wceq(cmvmul, cmpo(s0, s1, universe, universe, csb(s2, cfv(c1st, cv(s1)), csb(s3, cfv(c2nd, cv(s1)), cmpo(s4, s5, co(cfv(cbs, cv(s0)), cmap, cxp(cv(s2), cv(s3))), co(cfv(cbs, cv(s0)), cmap, cv(s3)), cmpt(s6, cv(s2), co(cv(s0), cgsu, cmpt(s7, cv(s3), co(co(cv(s6), cv(s4), cv(s7)), cfv(cmulr, cv(s0)), cfv(cv(s5), cv(s7)))))))))))
bodyPretty: ‚ä¢ maVecMul =(s0 ‚àà ùïå, s1 ‚àà ùïå ‚Ü¶[(1st ` s1)/ s2][(2nd ` s1)/ s3](s4 ‚àà((Base ` s0)[‚Ü¶](s2 √ó s3)), s5 ‚àà((Base ` s0)[‚Ü¶]s3)‚Ü¶(s6 ‚àà s2 ‚Ü¶(s0[gsum](s7 ‚àà s3 ‚Ü¶((s6[s4]s7)[(√ó ` s0)](s5 ` s7)))))))
comment: The operator which multiplies an M x N -matrix with an N-dimensional vector. (Contributed by AV, 23-Feb-2019.)
